content: For release on delivery  1:40 p.m. EDT  May 17, 2019      The Federal Reserve’s Review of Its Monetary Policy Strategy, Tools, and  Communication Practices    Remarks by     Richard H. Clarida     Vice Chair     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at     “Fed Listens:  Education, Employment, and Monetary Policy in the Third District”  hosted by the Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia     Philadelphia, Pennsylvania    May 17, 2019
